text: The flag of Morocco was adopted on 17 November 1915. It has a red field with the green pentagram, a five-pointed linear star. The Moroccan flag is represented by a 5-pointed star on a red background. The green star represents the five pillars of Islam, and the red represents the blood of the ancestors and unity. ==References== Morocco Category:National symbols of Morocco Category:1915 establishments Category:1910s establishments in Africa Category:20th-century establishments in Morocco
title: Flag of Morocco
